mapper.insert: insert into band(createMaster, bandName, category, memberCnt, bandImgPath) values(#{createMaster}, #{bandName}, #{category}, #{memberCnt}, #{bandImgPath});
mapper.select: select band.* from band join bandJoinRequest on band.no = bandJoinRequest.bandNo where bandJoinRequest.memberId = #{_parameter} and bandJoinRequest.joinStatus = 'approved' union select * from band where createMaster = #{_parameter}
